Life requires (Re)Hydration

Only a being of the dreamscape will imbibe this deep integration of synchronicity. By summoning, we live. Nothing is impossible. To drink along your path is to become one with it. The complexity of the present time demands unfolding our consumption if we are going to survive.

Loud & Clear

People Aren't Drinking Enough Water

The concept is simple: Drink more water & less microscopic plastic. Every time you reuse your Grounded container is one fewer plastic bottle in a waste bin. That's one less foot print you leave. One intentional step in the direction of meaningful change.

Respectfully: CHILL

SALUT: To Your Health!

The number one way to improve the quality of your life is to drink more water. It’s such a simple concept, and so often forgotten in the rush to grab (and sell) a new pill, or detox product. Long story short, Seeker, there is no magic pill. No one is coming to save you from yourself, except yourself. And “luckily” (see also: intentionally by design) the amount of toxins you ingest and the amount of water you swallow (to clean out those toxins) are completely under your control. So, this idea is simple, drink more water. Drink more water from GLASS, not plastic. For two main reasons: plastic turns to waste & we want to reduce waste, and here’s the big one, it has been found that when we consume things from plastic we humans inadvertently ingest that plastic. The human body was never designed to consume plastics, and if you can prevent yourself from consuming plastics you will inevitably be better off and more healthy. And that’s the ultimate goal of JPD. HLC. More sustainable health for you. If you got all the way to the bottom of this page, I just wanted to take an extra second to thank you for this time you shared with me. I want you to know I really do care about you, and especially your health. Drinking more, and cleaner, water is just one step to the creation of the more perfect you, and it’s a step in the right direction. Cheers.
